item.title: Revel W893 In-Wall Speaker Review
item.description:
Foreword / YouTube Video Review

This speaker was loaned to me by John Schuermann, owner of [(https://www.thescreeningroomav.com/)] Colorado Springs / Las Vegas, for review and were received brand new in box. The speaker received countless hours’ worth of playtime using broadband stimulus to alleviate any concerns of “break in”.
